name: Editorial Check (Microsoft Style)

on:
  pull_request:
    branches: [feb-release]  # Change to your default branch if not 'main'

jobs:
  vale:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      # Checkout the repository
      - name: Checkout code
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      # Run Vale with Microsoft Style
      - name: Run Vale Linter
        uses: errata-ai/vale-action@master
        with:
          files: '*.rst'  # Check reStructuredText files instead of Markdown
          styles: |
            https://github.com/errata-ai/Microsoft/releases/latest/download/Microsoft.zip
          reporter: github-pr-check  # Show results in PR checks
        env:
          GITHUB_TOKEN: ${{secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN}}
